SEARCH
Package ru.ifmo.se.commands

Class ClearCommand

java.lang.Object
ru.ifmo.se.commands.Command
ru.ifmo.se.commands.ClearCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Executable
public class ClearCommand extends Command
Command that clears all elements from the collection. This command removes all elements from the collection managed by the collection manager.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public boolean execute(IOManager ioManager, String[] arguments) throws WrongAmountOfArguments
      Executes the clear command, removing all elements from the collection.
      Specified by:
      execute in interface Executable
      Specified by:
      execute in class Command
      Parameters:
      ioManager - the IO manager to use for input/output operations
      arguments - the arguments to pass to the command (should be just the command name)
      Returns:
      true if the command was executed successfully
      Throws:
      WrongAmountOfArguments - if the number of arguments is not 1
